content: The speaker mentioned using relevant hashtags and tagging other users to increase engagement. I've been trying to do that, but I'm not sure if I'm doing it right. My tweets are usually about social media campaigns I'm interested in or participating in, like the #BreakTheSilence campaign I was part of recently. I have around 500 followers, and I usually get around 1-2 likes or retweets per tweet. My target audience is people interested in social media marketing and campaigns, and I usually post 2-3 times a week in the morning.
